scripts.build: npm --prefix packages/frontend run build && npm --prefix packages/backend run build
scripts.lint: npm --prefix packages/frontend run lint && npm --prefix packages/backend run lint
scripts.test: npm --prefix packages/frontend test && npm --prefix packages/backend test
scripts.proto: cp -R proto/* packages/backend/proto && cp -R proto/* packages/frontend/proto

hooks.pre-commit: npm run test && lerna run --concurrency 1 --stream precommit
